mapper.insert: insert into crm.tbl_tran(id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime) VALUES ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money},#{name},#{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source},#{activityId},#{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime},#{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
mapper.select:
select count(t.id) from crm.tbl_tran t join crm.tbl_customer c on t.customerId = c.id join crm.tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id join crm.tbl_contacts ct on t.contactsId = ct.id
ct.id in (select id from crm.tbl_contacts where fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%') and c.id in (select id from crm.tbl_customer where name like '%' #{customerId} '%')
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'

select t.id, u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, c.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, t.activityId, ct.fullname as contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime from crm.tbl_tran t join crm.tbl_customer c on t.customerId = c.id join crm.tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id join crm.tbl_contacts ct on t.contactsId = ct.id
ct.id in (select id from crm.tbl_contacts where fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%') and c.id in (select id from crm.tbl_customer where name like '%' #{customerId} '%')
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
order by t.createTime desc

select tran.id, user.name as owner, tran.money, tran.name, tran.expectedDate, cus.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, tran.source, act.name as activityId, con.fullname as contactsId, tran.createBy, tran.createTime, tran.editBy, tran.editTime, tran.description, tran.contactSummary, tran.nextContactTime from crm.tbl_tran tran join crm.tbl_user user on tran.owner = user.id join crm.tbl_customer cus on tran.customerId = cus.id left join crm.tbl_activity act on tran.activityId = act.id left join crm.tbl_contacts con on tran.contactsId = con.id
where tran.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update crm.tbl_tran set stage=#{stage},editBy = #{editBy},editTime = #{editTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) value, stage name from crm.tbl_tran group by stage
